pack.description.vibrancy.textures: Improved textures for use with Vibrancy
pack.description.vibrancy.ripple: An improved "rippling" effect for the enchantment glint
options.vibrancy.dynamic_lightmap.toolti: Tweaks the lighting colors based on player position. Ex: Light blue in a cold biome, yellow-tan in a desert biome, orange in the nether
options.vibrancy.raytrace_distance.toolt: The distance from camera where lights have perfect shadows, lights beyond this use an approximation
options.vibrancy.light_cull_distance.too: The distance from camera when lights are no longer displayed (for performance reasons)
